item.title: Tax-Free Holiday!
item.description:
Last week, a client reached out because their employees’ state taxes weren’t being calculated correctly, despite seemingly accurate setup in the system. Everything appeared properly configured: state tax assignments, default state codes, pay codes subject to state tax, and transaction entries. However, upon examining the build and calculate reports, the state tax was present in the build report but missing from the calculation. The culprit? The default filing status for that state’s tax code was set to 0%...
